articles.title: If You're Still Running Windows 10, You Need to Do This One Thing Before Oct. 14 - CNET
articles.description: Windows 10 users who aren't upgrading to Windows 11 need to enroll in a Microsoft's Extended Security Updates program to receive critical security updates.
